## Input.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Input` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(type: number, name: string, block: Block, connection: Connection | null);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  type | number | The type of the input. |
|  name | string | Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this input again. |
|  block | [Block](./blockly.block.md) | The block containing this input. |
|  connection | [Connection](./blockly.connection.md) \| null | Optional connection for this input. |
